name: HouseAilsa
_source: s;Ailsa;I-I can't let them see me like this.|Raelin...{w} She can't know.{w} She can't.

s;Ailsa;So, this your answer, Goddess?{w} Is this the deliverance I've prayed for?{w}{clear}{c:expression;Ailsa;HalfCloseEyes}Why...{w} why does it have to take her{c:expression;Ailsa;CloseEyes} too?{w} Why couldn't it just be me...?
s;RDad;...{w} We won't be back for some time.{w}{clear}I trust you can watch over Raelin while we're gone?{w} Just for now.
s;SAilsa;Watch over Raelin?{w} You sure?{w} Kid's old enough to watch herself, no?
s;RDad;Well...{w} like I said.{w} We'll be gone for quite some time.{w} We need you-
s;SAilsa;How long is "some time"? A week?|A month?{w} Several months?{w} More?
s;RDad;We're not sure, but...{w} months, at least.{w} So please, Raelin-
s;SAilsa;I can't watch her for that long.{w}{clear}Either toughen her up before you leave, or take her the hell with you.
s;RDad;You know neither of those ideas are realistic.{w} Ailsa...{w} we're family.|You're supposed to be there for us.

s;SAilsa;Get outta here before I change my mind.{w} Abandoning your kid like this?{w}{clear}{c:mirror_portrait;SAilsa}No brother of mine would be such a spineless coward.{w} Go on!{w} Get moving!{w}{clear}Gotta prepare for the kid's sake.
# He leaves, and Ailsa closes her eyes
s;SAilsa;...{w} Goddess...{w} stop testing me, you witch of a woman.{w} You hear me?

s;SAilsa;You know I'm not strong enough.|You know I can't care for her.{w}{clear}You know every time I go out there on that boat, I stare at the waves,|wondering how long it'd take for|anybody to notice if I was gone.{w}{clear}But instead of letting me finally dive down beneath the waves...{w}{clear}you give me this?{w} Is that the reason?|To keep me trapped here even longer?{w}{clear}Why can't I just...{w} why won't you let me...{w} I only want to...{w} to...
s;SAilsa;...{w} but you'll never allow it.

s;SAilsa;I'll do it.{w} I'll watch the child.{w}{clear}She deserves better parenting than what those layabouts give, anyway.{w}{clear}And when I get out on that boat, and I hear the water calling to me...{w}{clear}I'll stay in the boat.{w} I promise.

s;Ailsa;It's funny...{w} I've wished for it for so long, and now that it's here, I...{w}{clear}I'm not ready to go.{c:expression;Ailsa;HalfCloseEyes}{w} I still have so much to teach Raelin, so much to do.{w}{clear}What a cruel joke, to finally grant me my wish when I no longer need it.{w}{clear}I'll play your game, Goddess.{w} I'll fight to the very end for her sake.{w}{clear}And when I die, and I'm at your gates, I'll be cursing your name.
update_achievement;14;Alone, in Good Company;Viewed Ailsa's Flashback in Ch5.
